text: About Endlessness () is a 2019 Swedish German Norwegian drama movie directed by Roy Andersson and stars Ania Nova, Lesley Leichtweis Bernardi, Martin Serner, Tatiana Delaunay, Jan-Eje Ferling, Thore Flygel, Karin Engman, Magnus Wallgren. In 2019, it won the Silver Lion for Best Direction at the Venice Film Festival. == Other websites == * * * Category:2019 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Andersson
title: About Endlessness
